Hi Joel

I have updated our FAQ page on our old ZIP Money product and converted it into Advantage Pay Later.

https://advantagestyling.com.au/zip-money/

I've done it all, but I need some minor assistance with changing a few things:

  1. Can you please change the sub-URL to be…/advantage-pay-later/

  2. Can you please change the menu item in the home page that links to this page (currently zipMoney Payment Plan) to be called Advantage Pay Later

  3. The page still has the old ZIP Money logos. Wherever you see these logos can you please change these out with the attached logo for Elepay. It would be great if it could say 'powered by….' So we retain this. I believe there are 3 places to change the logo out.



Other than this, the page is ready to go live and in fact it is live!

Cheers

Dan

Hi Joel This looks amazing. Thank you. I believe we are super close to going live! I had a few small things to point out:
  • Quote platform settings: Can we please default new or copied proposals to ALWAYS including Advantage Pay Later?
  • Page 1 information box on Advantage Pay Later (mobile device view): it is looking too crowded to include all that info. Let's delete the sentence at the bottom: "Enables you to style…" so its just the bullet point. This will enable you to space out the box a little better. You can also delete the final bullet point "Fees from as low as 2%" because it is repeated above.
  • Page 1 information boxes for all payment methods: can you please use the new gold line for all of them. Can you please centre align the gold line so there is similar spacing to the characters below and above it. It needs some formatting love.
  • Page 2 pop up when you select Advantage Pay later: In the table please change 107 days to 120 days (sorry this was a typo). In the table, can you also please shade the whole thing grey. To the point 2 the wording should be "…your styling fees to Advantage…." (not OUR). To the point 3 below (beginning "When you have selected…") can you please add an additional sentence after the full stop, as follows: "The Elevare Styling Plan is a loan product and the application may include a credit check. Approval of the application is at Elevare's sold discretion."
Thanks Joel - once we are done with this, we can take it live this evening. Cheers Dan Dan Gerber Managing Director Advantage Property Styling Follow us on: M 0412 955 531 | P 02 9310 1611 Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019 www.advantagestyling.com.au

Hi Dan,

We have made some changes on the staging. https://staging-proposaladvantage.kinsta.cloud/

Please see below: 
On the mobile version when you scroll over the "I" (information button) of the various payment options, it takes you back to the top of the screen without showing the information. We need to fix this please so it acts similar to a hover over information symbol on a desktop version.
- On desktop we are showing the information on a tool tip, on mobile the information is being shown below the thin grey line.  

Then two lines (similar to Advantage Plus): Upfront Amount: $0.00
Pay by 120 days: $3,971.25
- Do you want us to remove the "Pay by 45, Pay by 60"?

Amazing - thank you Joel!

I think the main thing is that we tighten up the presentation.

We will have a logo for you to drop in soon!

Dan

Dan Gerber

Managing Director

Advantage Property Styling

Hello Joel Thanks for sending this on. I appreciate the update but upon my review, there are still a number of things we need to fix:
  • The mobile version shows two of every payment option? Can you please fix this.
  • On the mobile version when you scroll over the "I" (information button) of the various payment options, it takes you back to the top of the screen without showing the information. We need to fix this please so it acts similar to a hover over information symbol on a desktop version.
  • Can we please amend the information box for the Advantage Pay Later option as follows:
    • Leave space for a LOGO the same size as the other two. We will develop this.
    • Below the logo please print a heading called 'Advantage Pay Later' (this should be the same size as the 'Pay with EFT')
    • Then two lines (similar to Advantage Plus): Upfront Amount: $0.00
    • Pay by 120 days: $3,971.25
    • Below the thin grey line: "No upfront fees, no monthly repayments."
    • Please delete all of the other information below that. Starting with "Enables you to style now…" and ending with "…nothing more to pay."
  • Once client has accepted quote, please can you fix up the Advantage Pay Later election box in the mobile version - formatting is not good. We will provide an Advantage Pay Later logo.
  • Pop up confirmation box on election of Advantage Pay Later. Please make the bullet points at the bottom with the various terms and interest amounts sub-bullets (in other words, they live below the final bullet point). Please fix the spacing as well.
  • Below the bullet point: "If you elect to use Advantage Pay later…", please insert a NEW bullet point: "Approval of the loan for your styling will at Elevare's sole discretion. If your application is approved, your property styling loan with Elevare will commence 13 days after you submitted your application for the loan. The term of the Elevare loan is then 107 days. Further information will be provided to you by Elevare as part of the application and once the loan is approved. "
Thanks Joel. Please call me if you'd like to run through any of these amendments. Can I please ask you to review BOTH the desktop and mobile versions of these revisions before you submit the next version for review. Cheers Dan Dan Gerber Managing Director Advantage Property Styling Follow us on: M 0412 955 531 | P 02 9310 1611 Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019 www.advantagestyling.com.au
